channel.title: RuneEden 317 [HD] - Bringing RuneEden Back!
channel.description:
[center][u][b]RuneEden 317 [HD][/b][/u][/center] [center]Please Give Feedback![/center]
I am currently working very hard to bring RuneEden back. RuneEden was a 317 private server I created way back when I was a beginner coder in 2007. I released newer and later versions and eventually it became a popular server with lots of dedicated players. Most people know me as Torax or Halfling. I decided to change my admin name to Havoc so if you see me on your server you will know who I am.
The reason why I stopped hosting RuneEden is because of financial problems, and dealing with PayPal and other payment method programs. The new server will be released and hosted for free.
I am making lots of big improvements before I release the new server. I have updated the client and server to load 508 character/npc models and 474 character/npc animations, the server revision itself is still considered a 317.
So far I have created a webclient loading all RS items from 317 to 508 and above. I haven't yet done a lot to improve it server sided, but I am working on it as we speak.
I will show you screenshots of what I've done to the new server so far.
BTW I created this server from an old dodian source that was pretty much blank, so the only people I am giving credit to are Winten, Bakatool, the good people of MoparScape Forums and myself.
Note that this is a re-creation of my old source, so I've only spent about 1 month on this source.
[u][b]Screenshots:[/b][/u] [b]Perfect Equipment Interface[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht01.png[/img] [b]Kree'arra with working animations and drops[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht02.png[/img] [b]Tormented Demons with working animations and drops[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht03.png[/img] [b]Rats[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht04.png[/img] [b]Working thieving with random event[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht05.png[/img] [b]Soldiers[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht06.png[/img] [b]Druids[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht07.png[/img] [b]Moss Giants[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht08.png[/img] [b]General Graardor with working animations and drops[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht09.png[/img] [b]All working Skillcapes and emotes[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht10.png[/img] [b]Commander Zilyana with working animations and drops[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht11.png[/img] [b]New Mining Area, New Rocks[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht12.png[/img] [b]Gambling NPC with Blackjack, and more[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht13.png[/img] [b]Death Wings with lots of health and drops[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht14.png[/img] [b]Shades, drop ghostly robes[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht15.png[/img] [b]Ice Strykewyrm, drops Staff of Light, Abyssal Demons, drops whip[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht16.png[/img] [b]Skeleton Hellhounds, drops skeletal armor and more[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht17.png[/img] [b]Rock crabs, great exp and health[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht18.png[/img] [b]Hellhounds, drop all god armor, Dragons[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht19.png[/img] [b]Hill Giants with drops[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht20.png[/img] [b]New woodcutting areas[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht21.png[/img] [b]Working lunar spells and ancient spells[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht22.png[/img] [b]Prayer altar, use with bones to get extra EXP[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht23.png[/img] [b]Werewolves that drop different types of claws[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht24.png[/img] [b]New Emotes![/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23284976/moparscape/scrsht25.png[/img]
And much more!
I will be showing more soon, I won't show everything until the server is actually released.
Thanks for taking the time to check out RuneEden 317 [HD]!
Please give feedback, comments, suggestions, etc. thanks!

item.title: RuneEden 317 [HD] - Bringing RuneEden Back!
item.dc:creator: @timmaah timmaah
item.description:
@timmaah wrote:

nice server havoc but when is this server suppose to be coming out? i see you gotta work on forums and stuff… so im just curious when the server is suppose to be out?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneEden 317 [HD] - Bringing RuneEden Back!
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Those hd models consist of changing the cache, and maybe only assigning emotes and entity definitions.

Im not going to have this turn into a flame war and get an infraction, so im just going to leave this, because i know a war WILL start.

-drubrkletern

Who cares if they only consist of doing a few things? Why does it matter? The point in this section of the forum is to show off your projects and maybe get feedback or suggestions not sit there and tell someone what there server is and is not. Unless of course they did leech or use another source, in this case I didn’t.

Read full topic

I worked very hard on this server. If I knew what DSPK was I probably wouldn’t use it for a source seeing its a “PK” server.
[/quote]

item.title: RuneEden 317 [HD] - Bringing RuneEden Back!
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Well you're animation look great

Offtopic: What I never understood was why people added 500+ char models to a 317, I think you just try a 508

Thank you very much. You are very right about people adding 508 char models to a 317. To tell you the truth the only reason why I did it was to mix things around and try to have a different type of server, and at the same time have the 317 feel to it. A lot of people like 317, and alot of people like 500+.

I never really liked having anything above a 474 tbh, just got boring after a long time.

Read full topic

I realize that, I just explained the reason why I called it HD. Because RuneEden use to be a normal 317 without any 508 graphics or animations. If you compare it to my old server, this would be RuneEden 317 [HD].[/quote]

Wouldnt you just say its a 317 loading higher revision graphics?

item.title: RuneEden 317 [HD] - Bringing RuneEden Back!
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

This looks good, Hope to see this in the downloads section soon

Anyways, Where is the HD part of RuneEden 317 [HD?]…

Well, its basically HD for a 317, its got the 508 character and npc features, and some of the maps. Not sure if I will release it in the downloads section, just want to see how far I can go with it right now. Thanks for the positive comment though! I’ll let you know if I ever do release it.

Read full topic
